title: The Bad Pac-Man
description:
Emerging markets experts Lee Buchheit and Mitu Gulati join Felix Salmon and Anna Szymanski to discuss how emerging markets are faring in the COVID-19 crisis, the Argentine debt default, and Pac-Man. 

And in the Plus segment: Lee’s crisis sovereign-debt-relief plan. 


Email: slatemoney@slate.com
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli.

Twitter: @felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @EmilyRPeck
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
